attributes.action: Lower the age on a smear test for women from 25 to 16
attributes.background: Lower the age on a smear test for women from 25 to 16. As a mum of two I think it’s important that as soon as you become a young lady that all women should be checked as it could be too late at the age of 25.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Fund annual cervical screening from age 16 or when first sexually active
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605372
